QuestData.Title: A Bloody Mess
QuestData.Description:
<The vial is filled with a viscous, bubbling substance. It bears a striking resemblance to the animated horrors around you.
It struggles against the container, as if trying to escape. Pike would surely be interested in more samples.>
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak to Brother Pike in Tidecross.
QuestData.CompletionText: What is that you have there?
QuestData.RewardText: This tideblood is saturated with dark magic. Thank you for bringing it to me.
